>   - The plugging of an extremely nasty memory leak

Does that mean the game will stop crashing as often?  Before I noticed 
after I played about 10 or so scenarios, the game usually wanted to 
crash.  Same thing with editing scenarios.  After loading 10 or so 
scenarios into the editor, the scenario editor usually crashed.
